DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the effect of PEG-400 and Systane on quality of vision after LASIK.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of PEG-400 and Systane Artificial Tears (Alcon) on Quality of Vision
DOC.criteria: Males or females > 21 years old Scheduled to undergo bilateral LASIK Likely to complete all study visits and able to provide informed consent Prior or current use of topical cyclosporine within the last 1 year Known contraindications to any study medication or ingredients Ocular disorders Active ocular diseases or uncontrolled systemic disease Active ocular allergies Complications at the time of surgery
